metadata.name: ofoid Candy Ore [2 of 20]
metadata.description:
“Candy Ore” is piece 2 of 20 in this limited collection.

Each Screen Pop is a scoop of summer bliss with a dollop of creativity on top. Designed for optimal viewing on a mobile device, every NFT in this collection is hand-crafted, visually distinct, and uniquely memorable. Just like the good ol’ days, save the sticks and be the first to collect a special prize when the time comes. See you on Null Island!
